alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Clinton; Daviess; DeKalb (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 12:30AM CDT until July 08 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DAVIESS...CLINTON...NORTHWESTERN CALDWELL AND DEKALB COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Maysville to Cameron to near Osborn to 6 miles north of Lathrop to near Plattsburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Gower, Maysville, Stewartsville, Trimble, Union Star, Osborn, Clarksdale, Kidder, Winston, Altamont, Turney, Weatherby, Amity, Fairport and Santa Rosa. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 36 and 71. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
